subject: Re: Re: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN1779
description_text:
Ok sounds good, I already have a power supply.

On Wed, Jun 18, 2025 at 9:08 AM General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> That's right.
>
>
> Alex Yu<alexy4744@gmail.com> 在 2025年6月18日 周三 20:21 写道：
> So my order should be ok if I purchase a separate power supply, correct?
>
> On Wed, Jun 18, 2025 at 4:58 AM service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
> wrote:
>
>> Hi Alex Yu,
>>
>> You’ll need to purchase our PlusX controller, a separate 24V power
>> supply, and the motor individually, as their controller is not compatible.
>>
>>
>> On Tue, 17 Jun at 9:51 PM , Alex Yu <alexy4744@gmail.com> wrote:
>> I'm using Simjack pedals, so this control box will only for the Vam motors
>>
>> On Tue, Jun 17, 2025 at 9:49 PM SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:
>>
>>> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>>>
>>> Hi, I noticed you purchased the Vam motor and the control box for the
>>> Pro X Ultra, were you previously using the Pro X pedal. the Pro X supports
>>> the VAM without having to purchase a new control box.
>>> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
>>> service@simsonn.com
>>>
>>
